Grifols CEO says Gotham report is wrong, pledges to improve governanceThe CEO of Spanish pharma company Grifols said there was room to improve communications and governance of the company, but a negative report by Gotham City Research that questioned its accounting was "absolutely wrong". Thu, 11 Jan 2024 13:57:53 GMT OQDYQJZ6AZLEXIUJOHK43D72CE https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/grifols-ceo-says-gotham-report-is-wrong-pledges-improve-governance-2024-01-11/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
China raises concerns with US over chip-making export controls, sanctionsChina's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao expressed concern over U.S. curbs preventing third countries from exporting lithography machines to China during a phone call with U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo on Thursday, his ministry said. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 11:48:45 GMT H6O45XUQWFOYPIX4RKB2AEGY3M https://www.reuters.com/technology/china-raises-concerns-with-us-over-chip-making-export-controls-sanctions-2024-01-11/Joe Cash技术

German foreign minister, in Philippines, raps China's 'risky manoeuvres' in South China SeaGermany's foreign minister criticised the Chinese coastguard's activities in the South China Sea, including its use of lasers and water cannon, during a visit on Thursday to the Philippines, saying the actions were causing concern in Europe too. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:57:48 GMT H7XD3G4CHFNV3BSKUC55GY77JA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-foreign-minister-philippines-raps-chinas-risky-manoeuvres-south-china-sea-2024-01-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Taiwan spotlights China crackdown on Hong Kong ahead of key pollAs Taiwan prepares to hold a closely watched election on Saturday, the main political parties have highlighted China's crackdown in Hong Kong and rejected Beijing's model of governance there being applied to the self-ruled island. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:40:42 GMT 4Y6HA7X7NRNSJOOAZHLBXMFI2M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-spotlights-china-crackdown-hong-kong-ahead-key-poll-2024-01-11/James Pomfret世界亚太地区
China coastguard vessels enter disputed waters in East China SeaThe Chinese coastguard said it patrolled the territorial waters of the Diaoyu Islands on Thursday to conduct "right protection". Ex-South Korea PM to launch new party ahead of April electionA former South Korean prime minister announced on Thursday his plan to launch a new political party in a move that aims to challenge the domination of the two leading parties in parliament in the run-up to an election on April 10. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:12:28 GMT AJEVN6D27ZNGXJL4OEKLAEFQDI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ex-south-korea-pm-launch-new-party-ahead-april-election-2024-01-11/Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
Mumbai gets a makeover as India binges on bridges, roads and railIndia's longest bridge, the 22-km (14-mile) Atal Setu linking central Mumbai with a fast-growing commercial hub across the Arabian Sea, will open on Friday in a ceremony by Prime Minister Narenda Modi as a centrepiece of his government's infrastructure drive. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 10:01:48 GMT YWXNLS5BZZP5HBUW34ZEGIVFIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/mumbai-gets-makeover-india-binges-bridges-roads-rail-2024-01-11/Shilpa Jamkhandikar, Ira Dugal世界印度
FACTBOX How does a Taiwan election work?Taiwan holds presidential and parliamentary elections on Saturday, which will be watched closely by neighbour China as it views the island as a Chinese province. Taiwan's government rejects Beijing's sovereignty claims. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 08:33:44 GMT 2CDNZNDDMBL6FHGAPHNSIPUSZA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/factbox-how-does-taiwan-election-work-2024-01-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Exclusive: SK On may start mass producing LFP batteries for automakers in 2026 - executiveSouth Korea's SK On plans to start mass producing lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries as early as 2026 to supply several automakers as it pushes to deliver a lower cost battery chemistry favoured by its Chinese rivals, a senior executive said. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 08:04:13 GMT C7LS3ROQLVIANFKEIKDG6BEJXE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/sk-may-start-mass-having-lfp-batteries-automakers-2026-executive-2024-01-11/Abhirup Roy, Heekyong Yang商业带电
Pakistan's former PM Sharif to launch election campaign as front-runnerPakistan's former prime minister Nawaz Sharif, whose party is considered a front-runner to win general elections in February, will kick off his campaign next week, aides said, days after the Supreme Court cleared him to run for a fourth term.
